string.value: The key tool used to fix the Orbis clouds is the Cloud Sprayer, but ever since Elma the Housekeeper borrowed it some 50 years ago, the sprayer hasn't been seen since. 50 years, and still no return??? I better go see #bElma the Housekeeper#k.
I met up with Elma and received the #t4031308# that she borrowed 50 years ago. I should go back to Spiruna's house now.
I have one more thing to ask; would you like to help me out?

To put together the #t4031309# and blend it in with the existing clouds, I'll need #t4031308# with me. It was supposedly held by #p2032001# before, but 50 years ago, she lent it to #bElma the Housekeeper#k, who was anxious to see the pictures. Now, your job is to go see Elma and get #b#t4031308##k from her.
It's been over 50 years since I lent it away, and ... I guess I shouldn't put too much hope up on this...

How can I help you? I'm in the midst of cleaning up place, so I do not have much time with me. It looks like you'll be covered with dirt in no time if you just stand there..\r\n#L0# #bI'm here to collect the #t4031308# that you have borrowed 50 years ago.#k
#t4031308#? Isn't that the item I lent to #p2032001 50 years ago. Maybe I haven't returned it yet. Please wait.
The person that borrowed #b#t4031308##k 50 years ago was... #bElma the Housekeeper#k.
